description: Tom’s family is now a crash of 6. This crash of orphans has been affectionately called “The CRAFTY 6’ with the name originating from the first letter of all of their names. Tom is a quiet and shy rhino calf who enjoys the company and confidence of Cotton and Ranger. He drinks 16L of milk a day and will continue to drink milk until the age of about 16 months old.
name: Tom
